security: The document discusses the detention of Victor Rico Galan by Mexican authorities and the potential use of material to persuade FUBRIAR-7 to assign officers to agent recruitment. Exposing the use of liaison with FUBRIAR-7 and the offer to train officers in ZRMETAL could compromise relationships with foreign intelligence services.
summary: This document pertains to Victor Rico Galan's activities, including his detention by Mexican authorities, and discusses potential liaison activities and recruitment efforts. It also involves a study of Prensa Latina and communications regarding Galan's coverage and connections.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents details the CIA's monitoring of Victor Rico Galan, a Mexican writer and political activist. The documents include dispatches discussing his detention by Mexican authorities in connection with student disturbances, his alleged involvement with the Movimiento Revolucionario del Pueblo, and his connections to leftist groups. The documents also reference efforts to gather information on Galan from various sources, including LICOOKY-1 and LITAMIL-9, and discuss strategies for using information to influence FUBRIAR-7, a liaison target, regarding recruitment efforts and agent training.
title: Victor Rico Galan Vol II
recipient: Chief of Station, Mexico City; Chief of Station, Guatemala City; Chief, WH Division
